Control Name: 1.9.9 Selective disk backup and restore for Azure VMs is used.
Control Statement: Using the selective disks backup and restore functionality, you can back up a subset of the data disks in a VM. This provides an efficient and cost-effective solution for your backup and restore needs.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.9 How do you manage storage and data costs for this workload?
